alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 11:42AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEAST WARREN...NORTHERN SARATOGA...AND BENNINGTON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1141 AM EST, snow showers were over Glens Falls moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Salem, Fort Edward, Corinth, Hartford, Dorset, West Glens Falls, Glens Falls North, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Porter, South Glens Falls, Rupert, Sandgate, Argyle, Cossayuna, Beartown, Dunham Basin, and Smiths Basin. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 17S and 20. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads and rapidly changing visibility. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
